alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:32AM CDT until March 25 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Farm land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 27.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.9 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Noxubee River Macon 26.0 27.3 Wed 9 am CDT 28.5 24.1 21.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
